description: Creates a new task template in the specified Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the task template.

parameters.name: Constraints
parameters.description: Constraints that are applicable to the fields listed. RequiredFields (list) --- Lists the fields that are required to be filled by agents. (dict) --- Information about a required field. Id (dict) --- The unique identifier for the field. Name (string) --- The name of the task template field. ReadOnlyFields (list) --- Lists the fields that are read-only to agents, and cannot be edited. (dict) --- Indicates a field that is read-only to an agent. Id (dict) --- Identifier of the read-only field. InvisibleFields (list) --- Lists the fields that are invisible to agents. (dict) --- A field that is invisible to an agent. Id (dict) --- Identifier of the invisible field. Name (string) --- The name of the task template field.

nested_params.name: RequiredFields
nested_params.description: Lists the fields that are required to be filled by agents.

nested_params.name: Id
nested_params.description: The unique identifier for the field.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the task template field.

nested_params.name: InvisibleFields

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the task template field.

parameters.name: Defaults
parameters.description: The default values for fields when a task is created by referencing this template. DefaultFieldValues (list) --- Default value for the field. (dict) --- Describes a default field and its corresponding value. Id (dict) --- Identifier of a field. Name (string) --- The name of the task template field. DefaultValue (string) --- Default value for the field.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the task template field.

parameters.name: Fields
parameters.description: Fields that are part of the template. (dict) --- Describes a single task template field. The unique identifier for the field. Name (string) --- The name of the task template field. Description (string) --- The description of the field. Type (string) --- Indicates the type of field. SingleSelectOptions (list) --- A list of options for a single select field. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Id
nested_params.description: The unique identifier for the field.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the task template field.

nested_params.name: SingleSelectOptions
nested_params.description: A list of options for a single select field.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.description: The identifier of the task template resource.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the task template resource.
